subject: Management
title: Delegation as a Development Tool
description: A short lesson to help you apply Delegation as a Development Tool.

hook.text: The best way to develop your team isn't training programs. It's real work with real stakes.

buildup.text: Every delegated task is an opportunity to build someone's skills and confidence.

discovery.text: Developmental delegation means choosing tasks specifically for their growth potential.

twist.text: It's slower than doing it yourself. But a year later, you have five capable people, not one.

climax.text: Match development goals to delegation choices and track growth over quarters.

punchline.text: Every task you delegate is a lesson you teach.

quiz.question: What is developmental delegation?
options: Choosing tasks for their growth potential for the delegate
Delegating only easy tasks to build confidence
Assigning tasks randomly to develop flexibility
